title: CLIENT DOESNT OPEN "GBSSNDRPT EXPECTED ARGUMENT 'I' "
body:
just installed a new windows 10 then updated and opened once and now the game doesnt work .. when i open the launcher i get LOL logo then an error immediately " gBsSndRpt expected argument 'i' " 
i tried to use hexteck tool and forced patch didnt work too and searched forums no luck also.. 
i sent a ticket to the support but they are really really slow took them some hours to respond the first time and just told me to clean remove and fresh download and install which i did after that and i got same error again and now its taking them ages to respond after i replied so does any1 know the solution to this error ? 

thats the error i get :

gBsSndRpt

Expected argument 'i' 
Usage: gBsSndRpt [@argfile] [/?|h|help] /i  [/q] /c  /a  /v 
 /d  /f  [/x ]... /m  /n  /r  
/z  /l  [/dl] [/dc]

@argfile Read arguments from the a file. 
/? Show Usage. 
/i  Configuration file 
/q Silent Mode 
/c  Vendor name 
/a  Application name 
/v  Application version 
/d  Description 
/f  Minidump file 
/x  Additional files 
/m  MFA 
/n  Dotnet 
/r  Repeat count 
/z  Zip 
/l  User Logfile Path 
/dl Debug to Log file 
/dc Debug to Console

replies.body: so the problem isnt fixed and now i have been waiting a reply for 2 days and the support didnt answer me !!! and i cant play i like how helpful the support can be !! you really dont want me to play it then ok thx np gl and goodbye

It looks like you still have an open ticket and a specialist who's helping you out with this.  It's really important to go over the troubleshooting steps provided to rule out possibilities, and your specialist will continue working with you to figure this out.  Hang tight and you will get a reply back as soon as possible.
well ya i know i have an open ticket but i didnt get any reply from morning so i had to ask somewhere else ya :/
